attributes.additional_details:
Stop David Cameron waiting till October to invoke article 50.
Cease fearmongering. 
Stop the Globalist ELITES agenda of central Control
It needs to be Addressed and INVOKED immediately.
The People have spoken and it should take immediate effect

STOP this Call for second referendum. The people have spoken.
